examples: There are only three cookies left.
three of Sweden’s top financial experts
Ten people were invited but only three turned up.
Can you lend me three dollars?
I can't read your writing—is this meant to be a three?
The bulbs are planted in threes or fives (= groups of three or five).
We moved to America when I was three (= three years old).
Shall we meet at three (= at three o'clock), then?

meanings.def: two or three at a time; in small numbers
examples: People arrived in twos and threes.

meanings.def: reading, writing and arithmetic, thought to be the most important parts of a child’s education

idioms.def: two or three at a time; in small numbers
examples: People arrived in twos and threes.

idioms.def: reading, writing and arithmetic, thought to be the most important parts of a child’s education
